name: Serpent Spine

refinement_effect.refine_one: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 7% more DMG and take 2.7% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
